title: Phase 1: Core Infrastructure (MVP)
description: Basic block types (literal, variable, assignment), simple drag-and-drop from palette to canvas, AST generation from blocks. No nesting yet, flat programs only.

title: Phase 3: Polish & Advanced Features
description: Inline editing improvements, search/filter palette, undo/redo, block collapse/expand, custom block colors and styling.

title: Phase 4: Debugger Integration
description: Highlight currently executing block, show variable values on hover, step through blocks with debugger, breakpoints on blocks.

title: Create PRD for block-based editor interface
description: Comprehensive PRD document for visual block editor interface. Covers block types (based on AST nodes), UI components using Shadcn, drag-and-drop interactions, and 5-phase implementation plan. See PRD-BlockEditor.md for full details.

title: Phase 2: Nesting & Control Flow
description: Container blocks (function, if, while), nested expression blocks, full drag-and-drop with slot validation (block_slot and expression_slot).

title: Phase 2: Nesting & Control Flow
description:
Container blocks (function, if, while)
Nested expression blocks
Full drag-and-drop with slot validation

title: Phase 5: Advanced Editing
description: Copy/paste blocks, duplicate blocks, multi-select blocks, block templates/snippets, export/import block programs.
